Articles.Content: Can anyone make a variety of folding wing parts? Similar to those on carrier aircraft? I've been trying to get something like that to work using Infernal robotics, but I have so far found it clumsy and flimsy. I'm actually surprised nothing like it has actually come before
Maybe not exactly what you want but... http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/123273-Discreet-%28not-just-aircraft-anymore%29-Parts-%28Updated-21-06-15%29?highlight=discreet
You could try using infernal robotics to make that happen!

You could try using infernal robotics to make that happen!
I've been trying to get something like that to work using Infernal robotics, but I have so far found it clumsy and flimsy.

Not to mention the fact that it really starts to up the part count a lot.

Not to mention the fact that it really starts to up the part count a lot.

Using pWings and IR I made this little guy. It's only a hinge + a quantum strut per wing, it's not that bad.
